data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Covalima to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Covalima, Timor-Leste
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Covalima to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.section_summary: On average, 36 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Covalima, Timor-Leste.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, please give the 11,150 believers in the state of Covalima the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Covalima, Timor-Leste to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, move the 11,150 believers in the state of Covalima to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Covalima, Timor-Leste. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Covalima, Timor-Leste that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
